paper_abstract: In this paper, stability is considered for a class of fuzzy cellular neural networks with distributed delay Keywords: (FCNNDD). The condition for feedback kernel is minimal: the only condition required is that Exponential stability integral(t)(0) k(s) ds = 1. Significant for applications of neural networks, the stability of FCNNDD is discussed Fuzzy cellular neural networks when T is finite and infinite. Exponential stability is obtained with distributed delay in finite time, while Distributed delay asymptotic stability is obtained with distributed delay in infinite time. Equilibrium point (C) 2008 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Stability of periodic solution in fuzzy BAM neural networks with finite distributed delays
